title: Utility
description: Discover various utility components for common tasks and functionalities.

meta.title: LNGRZUI | Utility Documentation
meta.description: Discover various utility components for common tasks and functionalities.
meta.keywords: component library, reusable components, documentation, application development, UI toolkit

content.overview-desc: The Utility page introduces the Utility component, which offers a collection of utility classes and functions to assist with common tasks and styling.
content.how-to-desc: Import the Utility component or the specific utility classes/functions you need into your project. Utilize the provided utility features to simplify tasks such as styling, formatting, and data manipulation.
